name: Morphing Time
description:
Morphing Time is a 2D platformer that uses the theme of fitting in to find your way to 'rescue' your 'friend' (it's complicated, ok?) through a series of fun and engaging levels (possibly)

Although this jam was the longest one I've done, it's also the one I procrastinated on the most. I've learned a few things and had fun making it, so it was a positive experience!
